public class AeBpelGraphContainer
extends AeGraphContainer

This is the root level container for all BPEL activities.

getCoordinateList

public java.util.List getCoordinateList()
Returns:
List of AeBpelActivityCoordinates objects which contains the hit test areas.

getCoordinates

private void getCoordinates(AeBpelControllerBase aController,
                            java.util.List list)
Recursivley calculates the hit test areas. The hit test area used will be the area encompasing the icon and the label of the BPEL activity.

Parameters:
aController - parent controller
list - list containing the hit test objects.
